source:
TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Galla scans her surroundings, but for what...or whom?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
キャンプ・ブロークングラスのガッラは、冒険者に尋ねたいことがあるようだ。

source:
TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_SEQ_01<tab>Galla of the Ist Legion has recently made her way to Camp Broken Glass with the refugees, though she was hoping that a young, red-haired boy was among their number. Prior to Galla's departure, he was refusing to leave Tertium, and she believes the child is most likely still there. She petitions your aid in persuading the boy to join his countrymen at your camp, that he may benefit from the food and warmth on offer.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストには「<var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var><var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> レベルアジャスト」が、
　設定されています。

ガッラから駅で両親を探して待つ少年の話を聞いた。テルティウム駅の「ガッラ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_SEQ_02<tab>Upon arriving at the station, Galla tells you a little more about the boy, in particular his name: Volusus. Although he is probably rather reluctant to cooperate, his distinctive scarlet locks should at least make him easy to locate.
target: TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_SEQ_02<tab>ガッラと少年の居場所について話した。付近を捜索し、「ウォルスス」を見つけよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_SEQ_03<tab>You eventually find Volusus, and as he explains, he has no intention of going anywhere without his parents. He does, however, have something he wishes to discuss with you, and Galla urges you to hear him out in the hope he will eventually agree to join you at Camp Broken Glass.
target: TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_SEQ_03<tab>テルティウム駅の奥まった場所で見つかったウォルススは、やはりキャンプ・ブロークングラスへの移送を頑なに拒んでいる。無事の移送を促すためにも、両親を探すウォルススの話を聞いていくことにしよう。
TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_TODO_00<tab>テルティウム駅のガッラと話す

source: TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_GALLA_000_001<tab>I've seen you before... In Tertium, yes? I was part of the first group transferred here, but there's someone I'm trying to find. A small boy, red hair. Have you seen him?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_GALLA_000_001<tab>もし……貴殿は、テルティウム駅にもいらした方ですよね？
私は、ここに移送されてきたばかりなのですが……
赤髪の少年を見かけませんでしたか？

source: TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_GALLA_000_002<tab>Hmm... He's probably still refusing to budge.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_GALLA_000_002<tab>そうですか……。
ということは、この期に及んでまだ頑なに留まっているのか……？

source: TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_GALLA_000_003<tab>Oh, my apologies. Allow me to introduce myself: I'm Galla, Ist Legion. I've been doing what I can for the refugees...though I suppose I'm one myself.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_GALLA_000_003<tab>失礼、私は第I軍団に所属していた、ガッラと申します。
テルティウム駅で避難民の対応にあたっておりました。

source: TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_GALLA_000_004<tab>You see, I've always tried to help those in need─some call me a busybody, in fact. Before joining the military, I was a member of the Vigiles Urbani, and it was our duty to keep the citizenry safe. Old habits die hard, though, which is why I'm determined to look after that lad.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_GALLA_000_004<tab>今は軍属ですが、
以前は帝都の治安維持組織「ウィギレス」の一員でしてね。
どうにも、市民の様子が気になってしまう性分なんですよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_GALLA_000_005<tab>He's been separated from his parents in the chaos, but he won't leave the station without them.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_GALLA_000_005<tab>件の赤髪の少年も、駅にいた避難民のひとりでしてね。
はぐれた両親と待ち合わせしているからと、
こちらに移ろうと言っても、まるで聞き入れなかったんです。

source: TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_GALLA_000_006<tab>Thing is, that's no place for a child his age to be fending for himself─you've seen the conditions there. He needs food and warmth, which you and yours have been kind enough to offer.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_GALLA_000_006<tab>このキャンプに迎え入れてもらったばかりで恐縮ですが、
彼の安否がどうにも気がかりなままでして……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_GALLA_000_007<tab>I should go back to the station to try persuading him to join your camp. Could I trouble you to accompany me? It'll do him good to see you're not the monsters he probably thinks you are.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_GALLA_000_007<tab>とはいえ魔導兵器がうろつく市街を駅まで戻るとなると、
自分ひとりでは心もとなく……
よろしければ、同行していただけないでしょうか？

source: TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_GALLA_000_008<tab>Thank you! Well then, no time like the present!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_GALLA_000_008<tab>ありがとうございます！
駅で立ち回りを見ていましたので、あなたならばと思ったのです。
それでは「テルティウム駅」に向かいましょう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_GALLA_000_010<tab>If my prediction is correct, he should still be around here.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_GALLA_000_010<tab>ご足労いただき、ありがとうございます！
移送が進んでいるおかげか、ここも少し雰囲気が変わりましたね。
それでは早速、件の少年を探しましょう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_GALLA_000_011<tab>His name's Volusus, but most know him better for his scarlet locks. Considering how reluctant he is to leave, I doubt he'd answer if we tried calling out for him. Would you mind helping me look?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_GALLA_000_011<tab>名前は「ウォルスス」、赤い髪の毛が特徴でした。
移送を拒むくらいですから、
声を掛けられにくい場所に隠れているかもしれませんね……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_GALLA_000_020<tab>Where could he be? You wouldn't think it'd be this hard to find someone with a shiny crop of red hair like his...
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_GALLA_000_020<tab>探しているのは、赤い髪の「ウォルスス」です。
いったい、どこに隠れているのやら……。

TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_VOLUSUS_000_021<tab>だ、誰だっ……！
僕は絶対に、ここを離れたりなんかしないからな！

source: TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_GALLA_000_022<tab>Volusus! We've been looking everywhere for you! Still refusing to join everyone at the other camp, I see.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_GALLA_000_022<tab>ウォルスス！！
君はまだこんなところにいたのか！
派遣団の護衛に付いていくようにと言ったろう！？

source: TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_VOLUSUS_000_023<tab>I'm not going anywhere. Not without Mum and Dad.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_VOLUSUS_000_023<tab>ガッラさん……！
僕こそ、何度も嫌だって言った。
父さんと母さんが来るまで、絶対にここを動かないからっ……！

source: TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_GALLA_000_024<tab>Don't you see? It's for your own good!
target: TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_GALLA_000_024<tab>まったく、君の安全のためなんだが……！

source: TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_VOLUSUS_000_025<tab>I know you. Came here with Jullus, didn't you?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_VOLUSUS_000_025<tab>あなた……このまえ外から来て、
第I軍団のエライ人と対決してた人でしょう？

source: TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_VOLUSUS_000_026<tab>Please, you've got to listen to me! Mum and Dad are alive, I know they are!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_VOLUSUS_000_026<tab>ここの大人たちは、誰も僕の話を聞いてくれないんだ！
お願いだよ、僕の両親は絶対に生きている！
だから話を聞いておくれよ！

TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_GALLA_000_027<tab>おいおい、参ったなぁ……。
すみません、こんなつもりではなかったのですが……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_GALLA_000_029<tab>Sorry to burden you, but I've a feeling he'll be more cooperative once he's got this off his chest. Hear him out, would you?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZD101_04502_GALLA_000_029<tab>もしもまだ協力していただけるようなら、
少しだけ、ウォルススの話を聞いてやってください。
気が済めば、大人しく移送に応じてくれるかもしれませんので。
